name: iip-map
description: WordPress plugin used to embed Google maps and populate it with data via the Screendoor API
author: Office of Design, Bureau of International Information Programs, U.S. Department of State

scripts.build: npm run build:css & npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: npm run uglifyAdmin & npm run uglifyFront
scripts.uglifyFront: uglifyjs public/js/draw-gmap.js -o public/js/dist/draw-gmap.min.js -c -m --source-map & uglifyjs public/js/draw-ol-map.js public/js/ol-popup.js -o public/js/dist/draw-ol-map.min.js -c -m --source-map & uglifyjs public/js/markerclusterer.js -o public/js/dist/markerclusterer.min.js -c -m --source-map
scripts.version: versionbump 'version.json' 'package.json' && npm run build && git add --all
